name: CloudOpsGuys
tag_list: operations, performance, availability, monitoring, deployment, cloud, scalability, automation, testing, cloudops, webops, devops, managed-operations, saas, paas, iaas
overview:
The CloudOpsGuys offer Web “Operations-as-a-Service” so you can focus on your business goals, not trying to manage and scale your website.

We are experts at website operations - we’ve done it for www.totaljobs.com, www.cwjobs.co.uk, www.pizzahut.co.uk, www.rac.co.uk, www.tsl.co.uk and other websites.

We start where your IaaS or PaaS Cloud or Managed Service Provider stops - we focus on your full life-cycle application support requirement from testing to deployment to 24x7x365 Operations.

We want to simplify your on-line business so you can treat YOUR website like a SaaS solution - “SaaS your software” - and we’ll take care of the hassles of running your website on a day to day basis, and work with your development teams to make it faster and more scalable as your business grows.

Don’t let your website operations, performance and scalability become a bottleneck to the growth of your business - let us do it for you!

“Your Software | Our Service”
